biotools.summary: An R package for fast genome-wide prediction of antimicrobial peptides. It is fast and user-friendly method to predict antimicrobial peptides (AMPs) from any given size protein dataset. ampir uses a supervised statistical machine learning approach to predict AMPs.

bioschemas.name: ampir
bioschemas.summary: An R package for fast genome-wide prediction of antimicrobial peptides. It is fast and user-friendly method to predict antimicrobial peptides (AMPs) from any given size protein dataset. ampir uses a supervised statistical machine learning approach to predict AMPs.
